ygData.subject: Re: [gladiator] egroup contributions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi! ... Most of the subscribers might not have anything to talk about, or they may no longer be interested in the game, I for one barely play it anymore as

From: "Storey" <storey@...>

Hi!
> I have noticed that of all the people subscribing to this egroup,
> only
>  a handfull actually post messages.  It is not like there is nothing
> to talk about.  I can think of quite a few questions to be or have
> been posed that almost everyone should have a comment about.
Most of the subscribers might not have anything to talk about, or they may
no longer be interested in the game, I for one barely play it anymore as
many other games have come along since I purchased gladiator.
The people that post are the 'core' or devoted ones, the others on the list
have varying degrees of interest, every now and then they might post
something.
I think many are waiting for "Gladiator 2" or Gladiator: Beyond Freedom or
some sort of sequel, thats one of the reasons I'm still here :)

> Examples:
> What kind of scenario that is not out there would you like to see?
> Which gladiator character is the best?  why?
> What team is the best for handling any kind of scenario?
>
> I have general question:  when you finish all the scenarios that are
> shipped with the registered version of gladiator, what is the
> *lowest*
>  experience level that any member of your team has?  I need to know
> because of plans for the scenarios I am working on.
I tend to just play with a single cleric, but I completely forget which
level it ends up at once I finish all the built-in scenarios, it's been a
very long time since I last played through it.

Cya,
Deathifier
- Throwing in his somewhat confusing opinions.
